item.description:
Wicked Restaurant uses certified organic ingredients whenever possible along with fresh local agriculture. All our Pizza dough is made with Certified Organic flour, organic (natural starter) yeast, and purified water. Our pizzas selections are crafted from simple high quality cheese to intricate and innovative combinations……all cooked in our 700 degree stone hearth oven.
Our pizzas are inspired by true Neapolitan pizza making techniques, but modernized with amazing and exciting flavor combinations.
item.how_to_find_us: Barbara will be wearing her Girls Just Wanna Have Fun Pin in the lobby!

group.name: "Girls Just Wanna Have Fun!" Women Social Meetup Group

item.name: Wicked Restaurant and Wine Bar for pizza
